00065 void Window::onKeyDown(UChar ucKey, Int, Int)
00066 {
00067     // quit Window if the ESCAPE key is pressed

00069         onTerminate();

00087 void Window::onMouseClick(
00088         Int iButton, Int, Int iX, Int iY, UInt)
00089 {
00090         m_bLeftMousePressed = false;
00091         m_bRightMousePressed = false;
00092         m_bMiddleMousePressed = false;
00093 
00094         switch( iButton )
00095         {
00096                 case(0):
00097                         m_bLeftMousePressed = true;
00098                         break;
00099                 case(1):
00100                         m_bMiddleMousePressed = true;
00101                         break;
00102                 case(2):
00103                         m_bRightMousePressed = true;
00104                         break;
00105                 default:
00106                         m_bLeftMousePressed = true;
00107                         break;
00108         };
00109         
00110         m_bMouseDown = true;
00111         m_iLastMouseX = iX;
00112         m_iLastMouseY = iY;
00113 }

00125 void Window::updateClicks()
00126 {
00127     m_iClicks++;
00128         if(m_iClicks > 999999)
00129                 m_iClicks = 1;
00130 }
00131 //******************************************************************************
00132 void Window::drawFrameRate(Int iX, Int iY, const Color& rkColor)
00133 {
00134         Real fElapsed = 0;
00135     if ( --m_iTimer == 0 )
00136     {
00137                 fElapsed = m_kTimer.elapsedSeconds();
00138         if ( fElapsed > 0.0f )
00139             m_fFrameRate = m_iClicks/fElapsed;
00140         else
00141             m_fFrameRate = 0.0f;
00142                 
00143         m_iTimer = m_iMaxTimer;
00144                 m_iClicks = 0;
00145     }
00146         
00147     char acMessage[1024];
00148     sprintf(acMessage,"FrameRate: %.1lf fps",   (double)m_fFrameRate);
00149     drawString(acMessage, iX, iY, rkColor);
00150 }
